objects.specification: A large flat floor panel covering the entire booth footprint, featuring a smooth light grey finish, durable surface with minimal profile, providing a clean and seamless base for all interior elements.

A tall vertical wall panel with a light grey painted surface, rigid structural form with thin profile, uniform height and width to enclose the booth perimeter, smooth seamless finish for mounting graphics.
